title: Mosquito!
description: The President of the United States races to mobilize armed forces to stop a nuclear mutant giant mosquito causing terror across the city.
quote: This is one hell of a bug.
altHero: a giant mosquito in the sky
alt1: a giant mosquito on the roof of a car
alt2: a group of people looking frightened
alt3: mosquito arms breaking through a window
alt4: people cower as giant mosquito arms spread across the room
